Content.Text:
<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>! You came at a great time!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
I'm trying to take care of some
preparations for my next show...
<PAGE>
But I can't lift this all on my own.
Will you give me a hand?

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Really? Thanks! I knew you'd come
through for me!<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Nice work! Thanks to you, I was able
to get ready for my next show in no
time!
<PAGE>
You really saved me there!<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, <MYNAME>, I'm guessing you came
here because you had something to take
care of?
Give her the diamond.
Don't give her the diamond.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Is that a diamond? Wow, amazing! You
really did find it for me!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, thanks so much!
<PAGE>
Now that I've got this, my magic trick
will surprise everyone for sure!
<PAGE>
...<MYNAME>, I'm so happy we decided
to go out with each other!<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Ah, I really wish you didn't have to
leave... Have a safe journey home,
<MYNAME>!

Huh? It looks like I've got something
in my pocket.
<PAGE>
Oh, it's one of the props for Michelle's
magic show. I better go and return it
to her.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Hehe. I didn't actually think you'd find
it for me.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
You just might prove to be very
useful...

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
If I beg really cutely, I bet you'll
bring me whatever I want! Hmm... What
should I have you fetch me next.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
What about coral... Ah, an emerald would
be nice, but...
<PAGE>
Oh, I know! A <GREEN>pink diamond</GREEN> is what I
really want now! Then it's settled!<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
No reason in particular, you say? Oh,
I see.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, I'm sorry, but I actually have
a lot of other things to care of today.
So, if you could be on your way...

Huh? It looks like I've got something
in my pocket.
<PAGE>
Oh, it's one of the props for Michelle's
magic show. I better go and return it
to her.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Good grief! All of them are completely
useless to me!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
I can't get anyone to bring me a
diamond it seems...
<PAGE>
I shouldn't have even bothered to beg so
cutely.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
I've got to find an easy mark who will
bring me something better than this.
<PAGE>
But what do I want...

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Ah, that's it! A <GREEN>pink diamond</GREEN> would be
the perfect. All right, it's decided
then!<RED>∀</RED>
